Method Detail

ensureOid

protected void ensureOid(LocalityHints hints)
Description copied from class: AbstractDomainObject
Set the identifier (oid) of the object that is being created. This method is invoked by the default constructor. It is only intented to be invoked from within a constructor (with the exception of AbstractDomainObject.AbstractDomainObject(DomainObjectAllocator.OID), which has its own way of restoring the object's id.

Overrides:
ensureOid in class AbstractDomainObject

getOid

public OID getOid()
Description copied from class: AbstractDomainObject
Returns an internal global representation of this object. Although, it can be implemented simply as a call to AbstractDomainObject.getExternalId(), this method enables code **within** the framework to leverage on the knowledge of the concrete identifier, thus being more efficient. This method should only be used by code internal to the framework.

Overrides:
getOid in class AbstractDomainObject

getExternalId

public final String getExternalId()
Specified by:
getExternalId in interface DomainObject
Overrides:
getExternalId in class AbstractDomainObject

getLocalityHints

public LocalityHints getLocalityHints()
Description copied from class: AbstractDomainObject
Each BackEnd should provide an implementation for this method. No LocalityHints at this level.

Specified by:
getLocalityHints in interface DomainObject
Overrides:
getLocalityHints in class AbstractDomainObject
Returns:
The LocalityHints instance or null is this OID does not have LocalityHints.
